meanings.sent1: The dinky toy car fit perfectly in his palm.
meanings.sent2: She wore a dinky necklace that sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The dinky puppy tried to carry the big bone, looking adorable.
meanings.sent4: Her dinky voice was barely audible over the loud music.
meanings.sent5: The dinky flower bloomed bravely amidst the tall grass.

meanings.sent1: He dismissed the dinky details and focused on the main idea.
meanings.sent2: The dinky error in the report caused a big misunderstanding.
meanings.sent3: The dinky argument about the color of the pen made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her dinky role in the play stole the spotlight with her charm.
meanings.sent5: The dinky pebble went unnoticed among the rocks on the beach.

meanings.sent1: The dinky old chair creaked every time someone sat on it.
meanings.sent2: She refused to wear the dinky dress with the torn hem.
meanings.sent3: The dinky umbrella flipped inside out at the first gust of wind.
meanings.sent4: His dinky phone struggled to keep up with the latest apps.
meanings.sent5: The dinky house stood alone, its paint peeling in the sun.
